reviewText: This was a great documentary on the life of the late mob boss John Gotti Which shows his rise from a low level wise guy to the head of the gambino family the  most powerfull of all New Yorks Five mafia families.
This video was alright, I don't really like A&E to boaring and drags out about useless facts.  If you like John Gotti and mafia stuff you should get it, but be prepared it's not what you expect.
